name: Twitch Chat Credits Game: Spotlight!
description:
Super Smash Bros credits inspired game with Twitch

Game made for streamers to be played along with their Twitch chat. Shooting a name will display how long they have been following that person's channel. Gifted subs and resubs will display as a new name during the game. If you are worried about player avatars, I suggest putting your camera over that section.

The game will actually play Super Mario Odyssey music, but I changed it for the video to avoid strikes / claims :)

If you enjoyed this game, please consider checking out my other Twitch inspired game, Chataclysm! I would love to know if you play either of these games on stream. Thank you!

https://davidarthurpaul.itch.io/chataclysm
